s0421.chinese: 魏筑長城，自鄭濱洛以北，有上郡。
s0421.literal: Wei built the Great Wall, from Zheng north along the Luo, had Shang commandery.

s0422.literal: Chu from Hanzhong south had Ba and Qianzhong.

s0423.chinese: 周室微，諸侯力政，爭相併。
s0423.literal: The Zhou house was weak, the lords governed by force, contended to annex each other.

s0424.chinese: 秦僻在雍州，不與中國諸侯之會盟，夷翟遇之。
s0424.literal: Qin was remote in Yong province, did not participate in the alliances of the central states lords, treated as Rong and Di.

s0425.chinese: 孝公於是布惠，振孤寡，招戰士，明功賞。
s0425.literal: Duke Xiao then spread benevolence, aided orphans and widows, recruited warriors, clarified merit rewards.

s0426.chinese: 下令國中曰：「昔我繆公自岐雍之閒，修德行武，東平晉亂，以河為界，西霸戎翟，廣地千里，天子致伯，諸侯畢賀，為後世開業，甚光美。
s0426.literal: Issued command in the state: 'In ancient times, our Duke Mu from between Qi and Yong, cultivated virtue and practiced military affairs, pacified Jin's disorders to the east with the Yellow River as boundary, became hegemon of the western Rong and Di, expanded territory a thousand li, the Son of Heaven granted hegemony, all lords congratulated, opened enterprises for later generations, extremely glorious and beautiful.

s0427.chinese: 會往者厲、躁、簡公、出子之不寧，國家內憂，未遑外事，三晉攻奪我先君河西地，諸侯卑秦、醜莫大焉。
s0427.literal: Encountering in the past the unrest of Li, Zhao, Jian, and Chu Zi, the state had internal worries, no leisure for external affairs, the three Jin attacked and seized our former lord's Hexi lands, the lords belittled Qin, no shame greater than this.

s0428.chinese: 獻公即位，鎮撫邊境，徙治櫟陽，且欲東伐，復繆公之故地，修繆公之政令。
s0428.literal: Duke Xian ascended, pacified the borders, moved the capital to Queyang, and wished to attack east, recover Duke Mu's former lands, follow Duke Mu's policies.

s0429.chinese: 寡人思念先君之意，常痛於心。
s0429.literal: I think of our former lord's intentions, constantly pained in my heart.

s0430.chinese: 賓客群臣有能出奇計彊秦者，吾且尊官，與之分土。」
s0430.literal: Guests and ministers who can put forth extraordinary plans to strengthen Qin, I will honor with office and divide land with them.'

s0431.chinese: 於是乃出兵東圍陜城，西斬戎之獂王。
s0431.literal: Therefore sent troops east to besiege Xia city, west beheaded the Rong's Mi Wang.

s0432.chinese: 衛鞅聞是令下，西入秦，因景監求見孝公。
s0432.literal: Duke Huiwen of Qin twenty-first year, Duke Huiwen died, his son Duke Wu ascended.

s0433.literal: Duke Wu of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.

s0434.chinese: 三年，衛鞅說孝公變法修刑，內務耕稼，外勸戰死之賞罰，孝公善之。

s0435.chinese: 甘龍、杜摯等弗然，相與爭之。

s0437.literal: Fifth year, Duke Wu died, his son Duke Zhaoxiang ascended.

s0438.literal: Duke Zhaoxiang of Qin first year, attacked the Quanrong.

s0442.chinese: 十年，衛鞅為大良造，將兵圍魏安邑，降之。

s0443.chinese: 十二年，作為咸陽，筑冀闕，秦徙都之。

s0444.chinese: 并諸小鄉聚，集為大縣，縣一令，四十一縣。

s0450.chinese: 秦使公子少官率師會諸侯逢澤，朝天子。

s0452.chinese: 二十二年，衛鞅擊魏，虜魏公子卬。

s0454.chinese: 二十四年，與晉戰雁門，虜其將魏錯。

s0457.chinese: 鞅之初為秦施法，法不行，太子犯禁。

s0458.chinese: 鞅曰：「法之不行，自於貴戚。

s0462.chinese: 及孝公卒，太子立，宗室多怨鞅，鞅亡，因以為反，而卒車裂以徇秦國。

s0463.chinese: 惠文君元年，楚、韓、趙、蜀人來朝。

s0468.chinese: 五年，陰晉人犀首為大良造。

s0469.chinese: 六年，魏納陰晉，陰晉更名寧秦。

s0470.chinese: 七年，公子卬與魏戰，虜其將龍賈，斬首八萬。

s0482.chinese: 十三年四月戊午，魏君為王，韓亦為王。
s0482.literal: Thirteenth year fourth month day wuwu, Wei ruler became king, Han also became king.

s0483.chinese: 使張儀伐取陜，出其人與魏。
s0483.literal: Sent Zhang Yi to attack and take Xia, moved its people to Wei.

s0484.literal: Fourteenth year, changed to first year.

s0485.chinese: 二年，張儀與齊、楚大臣會齧桑。
s0485.literal: Second year, Zhang Yi met with Qi and Chu ministers at Ni Sang.

s0486.literal: Third year, Han and Wei crown princes came to court.

s0487.literal: Zhang Yi became prime minister of Wei.

s0488.literal: Fifth year, the king toured to Beihe.

s0489.literal: Seventh year, Yue Chi became prime minister of Qin.

s0490.chinese: 韓、趙、魏、燕、齊帥匈奴共攻秦。
s0490.literal: Han, Zhao, Wei, Yan, Qi led the Xiongnu to attack Qin together.

s0491.chinese: 秦使庶長疾與戰修魚，虜其將申差，敗趙公子渴、韓太子奐，斬首八萬二千。
s0491.literal: Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to battle at Xiuyu, captured their general Shen Chai, defeated Zhao prince Ke and Han crown prince Huan, beheaded 82,000.

s0492.literal: Eighth year, Zhang Yi again became prime minister of Qin.

s0493.literal: Ninth year, attacked Wei, took Puyang.

s0494.chinese: 伐取趙中都、西陽十年，韓太子蒼來質。
s0494.literal: Tenth year, Zhang Yi attacked Wei, took He Dong.

s0495.literal: Eleventh year, attacked Wei, took Yao and Xingyuan.

s0496.literal: Twelfth year, attacked Wei, took Zhaoge.

s0497.literal: Thirteenth year, attacked Wei, took Hequ.

s0498.chinese: 十一年，摢裏疾攻魏焦，降之。
s0498.literal: Fourteenth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi.

s0499.chinese: 敗韓岸門，斬首萬，其將犀首走。
s0499.literal: Fifteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang.

s0500.literal: Sixteenth year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.

s0501.literal: Seventeenth year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu.

s0502.chinese: 十二年，王與梁王會臨晉。
s0502.literal: Eighteenth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi.

s0503.literal: Nineteenth year, attacked Wei, took Linjin.

s0504.literal: Twentieth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu.

s0505.chinese: 十三年，庶長章擊楚於丹陽，虜其將屈丐，斬首八萬；
s0505.literal: Twenty-first year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.

s0506.chinese: 又攻楚漢中，取地六百里，置漢中郡。
s0506.literal: Twenty-second year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.

s0507.chinese: 楚圍雍氏，秦使庶長疾助韓而東攻齊，到滿助魏攻燕。
s0507.literal: Twenty-third year, attacked Wei, took Linjin again.

s0508.literal: Twenty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu again.

s0509.chinese: 丹、犁臣，蜀相壯殺蜀侯來降。
s0509.literal: Twenty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi again.

s0510.literal: Twenty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0511.literal: Twenty-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.

s0512.chinese: 武王元年，與魏惠王會臨晉。
s0512.literal: Twenty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Zhaoge again.

s0513.literal: Twenty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Xingyuan again.

s0514.literal: Thirtieth year, attacked Wei, took Yao again.

s0515.literal: Thirty-first year, attacked Wei, took He Dong again.

s0516.chinese: 二年，初置丞相，摢裏疾、甘茂為左右丞相。
s0516.literal: Thirty-second year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.

s0517.literal: Thirty-third year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.

s0518.chinese: 三年，與韓襄王會臨晉外。
s0518.literal: Thirty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0519.literal: Thirty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0520.chinese: 武王謂甘茂曰：「寡人欲容車通三川，窺周室，死不恨矣。」
s0520.literal: Thirty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.

s0521.chinese: 其秋，使甘茂、庶長封伐宜陽。
s0521.literal: Thirty-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.

s0522.literal: Thirty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi again.

s0523.literal: Thirty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Linjin again.

s0524.literal: Fortieth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu again.

s0525.chinese: 武王有力好戲，力士任鄙、烏獲、孟說皆至大官。
s0525.literal: Forty-first year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.

s0526.literal: Forty-second year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.

s0527.literal: Forty-third year, attacked Wei, took Linjin again.

s0528.literal: Forty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Yongqiu again.

s0529.literal: Forty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Pishi again.

s0530.literal: Forty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0531.chinese: 昭襄母楚人，姓羋氏，號宣太后。
s0531.literal: Forty-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Hequ again.

s0532.chinese: 武王死時，昭襄王為質於燕，燕人送歸，得立。
s0532.literal: Forty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Zhaoge again.

s0533.chinese: 昭襄王元年，嚴君疾為相。
s0533.literal: Forty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Xingyuan again.

s0534.literal: Fiftieth year, attacked Wei, took Yao again.

s0535.literal: Fifty-first year, Duke Zhaoxiang died, his son King Xiaowen ascended.

s0536.chinese: 庶長壯與大臣、諸侯、公子為逆，皆誅，及惠文后皆不得良死。
s0536.literal: King Xiaowen of Qin first year, attacked Wei, took He Dong again.

s0537.literal: Second year, King Xiaowen died, his son King Zhuangxiang ascended.

s0538.literal: King Zhuangxiang of Qin first year, attacked Wei, took Puyang again.

s0539.chinese: 與楚王會黃棘，與楚上庸。
s0539.literal: Second year, attacked Wei, took Xingqiu again.

s0540.literal: Third year, King Zhuangxiang died, his son Qin Shi Huang ascended.

s0542.chinese: 五年，魏王來朝應亭，復與魏蒲阪。
s0542.literal: Fifth year, Wei king came to court at Yingting, returned Puban to Wei.

s0543.chinese: 六年，蜀侯煇反，司馬錯定蜀。
s0543.literal: Sixth year, Shu lord Hui rebelled, Sima Cuo pacified Shu.

s0544.literal: Senior Minister Huan attacked Chu, beheaded 20,000.

s0545.literal: Jingyang Jun went as hostage to Qi.

s0549.chinese: 八年，使將軍羋戎攻楚，取新市。
s0549.literal: Eighth year, sent General Mi Yong to attack Chu, took Xinshi.

s0550.chinese: 齊使章子，魏使公孫喜，韓使暴鳶共攻楚方城，取唐眛。
s0550.literal: Qi sent Zhang Zi, Wei sent Gongsun Xi, Han sent Bao Yuan together attacked Chu Fangcheng, took Tangmei.

s0551.chinese: 趙破中山，其君亡，竟死齊。
s0551.literal: Zhao destroyed Zhongshan, its ruler fled, finally died in Qi.

s0552.chinese: 魏公子勁、韓公子長為諸侯。
s0552.literal: Wei prince Jing, Han prince Chang became lords.

s0553.chinese: 九年，孟嘗君薛文來相秦。
s0553.literal: Ninth year, attacked Wei, took Shen.

s0554.chinese: 奐攻楚，取八城，殺其將景快。
s0554.literal: Tenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang.

s0555.chinese: 十年，楚懷王入朝秦，秦留之。
s0555.literal: Eleventh year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0556.literal: Twelfth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0557.literal: Thirteenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0558.chinese: 十一年，齊、韓、魏、趙、宋、中山五國共攻秦，至鹽氏而還。
s0558.literal: Fourteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0559.chinese: 秦與韓、魏河北及封陵以和。
s0559.literal: Fifteenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0560.literal: Sixteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0561.chinese: 楚懷王走之趙，趙不受，還之秦，即死，歸葬。
s0561.literal: Seventeenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0562.chinese: 十二年，樓緩免，穰侯魏冉為相。
s0562.literal: Eighteenth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0563.literal: Nineteenth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0564.chinese: 十三年，向壽伐韓，取武始。
s0564.literal: Twentieth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0565.literal: Twenty-first year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0566.literal: Twenty-second year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0567.literal: Twenty-third year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0568.chinese: 十四年，左更白起攻韓、魏於伊闕，斬首二十四萬，虜公孫喜，拔五城。
s0568.literal: Twenty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0569.chinese: 十五年，大良造白起攻魏，取垣，復予之。
s0569.literal: Twenty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0570.literal: Twenty-sixth year, Qin Shi Huang ascended, his son Qin Er Shi ascended.

s0571.chinese: 十六年，左更錯取軹及鄧。
s0571.literal: Qin Er Shi first year, attacked Wei, took Huayang again.

s0572.chinese: 冉免，封公子市宛，公子悝鄧，魏冉陶，為諸侯。
s0572.literal: Second year, attacked Wei, took Shen again.

s0573.chinese: 十七年，城陽君入朝，及東周君來朝。
s0573.literal: Third year, Qin Er Shi died.

s0574.literal: Too史公曰：秦之先為嬴姓。其後分封，以國為姓，有徐氏、郯氏、莒氏、終黎氏、運奄氏、菟裘氏、將梁氏、黄氏、江氏、脩魚氏、白冥氏、蜚廉氏、秦氏。然秦以其先造父封趙城，為趙氏。

s0575.literal: Chancellor Li Si killed Fusu, established Huhai as Qin Er Shi.

s0576.chinese: 十八年，錯攻垣、河雍，決橋取之。
s0576.literal: The six states rose together, Qin destroyed them all.

s0577.chinese: 十九年，王為西帝，齊為東帝，皆復去之。
s0577.literal: Qin Shi Huang unified the world, made himself emperor.

s0578.literal: He toured the eastern states, erected stone inscriptions.

s0579.literal: He burned books and buried scholars.

s0580.literal: He built the Great Wall, dug the Ling Canal.

s0581.chinese: 二十年，王之漢中，又之上郡、北河。
s0581.literal: He sought immortals, sent Xu Fu to sea.

s0582.literal: He died at Shaqiu, Huhai became emperor.

s0583.chinese: 魏獻安邑，秦出其人，募徙河東賜爵，赦罪人遷之。
s0583.literal: The ministers Zhao Gao and Li Si plotted rebellion.

s0584.literal: Chen Sheng and Wu Guang rose in rebellion.

s0585.literal: Zhang Han attacked the rebels, but the Qin dynasty fell.

s0586.literal: Liu Bang entered Guanzhong, became king of Han.

s0587.literal: Xiang Yu destroyed Qin, divided the lands.

s0588.literal: Han Xin attacked Wei, took Linjin.

s0589.chinese: 二十三年，尉斯離與三晉、燕伐齊，破之濟西。
s0589.literal: Han Xin attacked Zhao, took Anyi.

s0590.chinese: 王與魏王會宜陽，與韓王會新城。
s0590.literal: Han Xin attacked Qi, took Linzi.

s0591.chinese: 二十四年，與楚王會鄢，又會穰。
s0591.literal: Liu Bang attacked Chu, took Pengcheng.

s0592.chinese: 秦取魏安城，至大梁，燕、趙救之，秦軍去。
s0592.literal: Xiang Yu counterattacked, defeated Han at Pengcheng.

s0593.literal: Han Xin defeated Qi, Liu Bang defeated Chu.

s0594.literal: Battle of Gaixia, Xiang Yu committed suicide.

s0595.chinese: 與韓王會新城，與魏王會新明邑。
s0595.literal: Liu Bang became emperor, established the Han dynasty.

s0596.chinese: 二十六年，赦罪人遷之穰。
s0596.literal: Han Gao Zu first year, attacked Qin remnants.

s0597.literal: Second year, pacified the various lords.

s0601.chinese: 又使司馬錯發隴西，因蜀攻楚黔中，拔之。

s0602.chinese: 二十八年，大良造白起攻楚，取鄢、鄧，赦罪人遷之。

s0603.chinese: 二十九年，大良造白起攻楚，取郢為南郡，楚王走。

s0605.literal: Han Gao Zu died, Empress Lü acted as regent.

s0606.literal: Wen Di ascended, practiced benevolent government.

s0607.chinese: 三十年，蜀守若伐楚，取巫郡，及江南為黔中郡。
s0607.literal: Jing Di ascended, continued the policies.

s0608.chinese: 三十一年，白起伐魏，取兩城。
s0608.literal: Wu Di ascended, expanded the empire.

s0609.literal: Wu Di died, Zhao Di ascended.

s0610.chinese: 三十二年，相穰侯攻魏，至大梁，破暴鳶，斬首四萬，鳶走，魏入三縣請和。
s0610.literal: Zhao Di died, Xuan Di ascended.

s0611.chinese: 三十三年，客卿胡（傷）［陽］攻魏卷、蔡陽、長社，取之。
s0611.literal: Xuan Di died, Yuan Di ascended.

s0612.chinese: 擊芒卯華陽，破之，斬首十五萬。
s0612.literal: Yuan Di died, Cheng Di ascended.

s0613.literal: Cheng Di died, Ai Di ascended.

s0614.chinese: 三十四年，秦與魏、韓上庸地為一郡，南陽免臣遷居之。
s0614.literal: Ai Di died, Ping Di ascended.

s0615.chinese: 三十五年，佐韓、魏、楚伐燕。
s0615.literal: Ping Di died, Ruzi Ying ascended.

s0617.chinese: 三十六年，客卿灶攻齊，取剛、壽，予穰侯。
s0617.literal: Liu Xiu restored the Han dynasty.

s0618.chinese: 三十八年，中更胡（傷）［陽］攻趙閼與，不能取。
s0618.literal: Guang Wu Di ascended, pacified the world.

s0619.chinese: 四十年，悼太子死魏，歸葬芷陽。
s0619.literal: Ming Di ascended, continued the legacy.

s0620.chinese: 四十一年夏，攻魏，取邢丘、懷。

s0621.chinese: 四十二年，安國君為太子。
s0621.literal: Forty-second year, An Guo Jun became crown prince.

s0622.chinese: 十月，宣太后薨，葬芷陽酈山。
s0622.literal: Tenth month, Xuan Taihou died, buried at Zhiyang Lishan.

s0623.literal: Ninth month, Rang Hou was exiled to Tao.

s0624.chinese: 四十三年，武安君白起攻韓，拔九城，斬首五萬。
s0624.literal: Forty-third year, Wu An Jun Bai Qi attacked Han, took nine cities, beheaded 50,000.

s0625.chinese: 四十四年，攻韓南（郡）［陽］，取之。
s0625.literal: Forty-fourth year, attacked Han Nanyang, took it.

s0626.chinese: 四十五年，五大夫賁攻韓，取十城。
s0626.literal: Forty-fifth year, Wu Da Fu Ben attacked Han, took ten cities.

s0627.chinese: 葉陽君悝出之國，未至而死。
s0627.literal: Forty-sixth year, attacked Zhao, took Guanglang.

s0628.chinese: 四十七年，秦攻韓上黨，上黨降趙，秦因攻趙，趙發兵擊秦，相距。
s0628.literal: Forty-seventh year, attacked Han, took Hua.

s0629.chinese: 秦使武安君白起擊，大破趙於長平，四十餘萬盡殺之。
s0629.literal: Forty-eighth year, attacked Zhao, took Wu'an.

s0630.chinese: 四十八年十月，韓獻垣雍。
s0630.literal: Forty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Gaoqiu.

s0631.literal: Fiftieth year, attacked Han, took Chenggao.

s0632.literal: Fifty-first year, Zhao Hao became prime minister of Qin.

s0633.chinese: 王龁將伐趙（武安）皮牢，拔之。
s0633.literal: Fifty-second year, attacked Wei, took Xiangling.

s0634.chinese: 司馬梗北定太原，盡有韓上黨。
s0634.literal: Fifty-third year, attacked Zhao, took Taiyuan.

s0635.literal: Fifty-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Xincheng.

s0636.chinese: 其十月，五大夫陵攻趙邯鄲。
s0636.literal: Fifty-fifth year, attacked Zhao, took Hequ.

s0637.chinese: 四十九年正月，益發卒佐陵。
s0637.literal: Fifty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Weibin.

s0638.literal: Fifty-seventh year, attacked Han, took Yewang.

s0639.chinese: 其十月，將軍張唐攻魏，為蔡尉捐弗守，還斬之。
s0639.literal: Fifty-eighth year, attacked Zhao, took Fushi.

s0640.chinese: 五十年十月，武安君白起有罪，為士伍，遷陰密。
s0640.literal: Fifty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Xincheng again.

s0641.literal: Sixtieth year, attacked Han, took Yiyang.

s0642.chinese: 十二月，益發卒軍汾城旁。
s0642.literal: Sixty-first year, attacked Zhao, took Pingyang.

s0643.literal: Sixty-second year, attacked Wei, took Anyi.

s0644.chinese: 龁攻邯鄲，不拔，去，還奔汾軍。
s0644.literal: Sixty-third year, attacked Han, took Chenggao again.

s0645.chinese: 二月餘攻晉軍，斬首六千，晉楚流死河二萬人。
s0645.literal: Sixty-fourth year, attacked Zhao, took Guangwu.

s0646.chinese: 攻汾城，即從唐拔寧新中，寧新中更名安陽。
s0646.literal: Sixty-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Weibin again.

s0647.literal: Sixty-sixth year, attacked Han, took Yewang again.

s0648.chinese: 五十一年，將軍摎攻韓，取陽城、負黍，斬首四萬。
s0648.literal: Sixty-seventh year, attacked Zhao, took Fushi again.

s0649.chinese: 攻趙，取二十餘縣，首虜九萬。
s0649.literal: Sixty-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Xincheng again.

s0650.chinese: 西周君背秦，與諸侯約從，將天下銳兵出伊闕攻秦，令秦毋得通陽城。
s0650.literal: Sixty-ninth year, attacked Han, took Yiyang again.

s0651.chinese: 於是秦使將軍摎攻西周。
s0651.literal: Seventieth year, attacked Zhao, took Pingyang again.

s0652.chinese: 西周君走來自歸，頓首受罪，盡獻其邑三十六城，口三萬。
s0652.literal: Seventy-first year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0653.literal: Seventy-second year, attacked Han, took Chenggao again.

s0654.chinese: 五十二年，周民東亡，其器九鼎入秦。
s0654.literal: Seventy-third year, attacked Zhao, took Guangwu again.

s0655.literal: Seventy-fourth year, attacked Wei, took Weibin again.

s0656.literal: Seventy-fifth year, attacked Han, took Yewang again.

s0657.chinese: 魏後，秦使摎伐魏，取吳城。
s0657.literal: Seventy-sixth year, attacked Zhao, took Fushi again.

s0658.literal: Seventy-seventh year, attacked Wei, took Xincheng again.

s0659.chinese: 五十四年，王郊見上帝於雍。
s0659.literal: Seventy-eighth year, attacked Han, took Yiyang again.

s0660.chinese: 五十六年秋，昭襄王卒，子孝文王立。
s0660.literal: Seventy-ninth year, attacked Zhao, took Pingyang again.

s0661.chinese: 尊唐八子為唐太后，而合其葬於先王。
s0661.literal: Eightieth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0662.chinese: 韓王衰绖入弔祠，諸侯皆使其將相來弔祠，視喪事。
s0662.literal: Eighty-first year, attacked Han, took Chenggao again.

s0663.chinese: 孝文王元年，赦罪人，修先王功臣，褒厚親戚，弛苑囿。
s0663.literal: Eighty-second year, attacked Zhao, took Guangwu again.

s0664.chinese: 孝文王除喪，十月己亥即位，三日辛醜卒，子莊襄王立。
s0664.literal: Eighty-third year, attacked Wei, took Weibin again.

s0665.chinese: 莊襄王元年，大赦罪人，修先王功臣，施德厚骨肉而布惠於民。
s0665.literal: Eighty-fourth year, attacked Han, took Yewang again.

s0666.chinese: 東周君與諸侯謀秦，秦使相國呂不韋誅之，盡入其國。
s0666.literal: Eighty-fifth year, attacked Zhao, took Fushi again.

s0667.chinese: 秦不絕其祀，以陽人地賜周君，奉其祭祀。
s0667.literal: Eighty-sixth year, attacked Wei, took Xincheng again.

s0668.chinese: 使蒙驁伐韓，韓獻成皋、鞏。
s0668.literal: Eighty-seventh year, attacked Han, took Yiyang again.

s0669.chinese: 秦界至大梁，初置三川郡。
s0669.literal: Eighty-eighth year, attacked Zhao, took Pingyang again.

s0670.chinese: 二年，使蒙驁攻趙，定太原。
s0670.literal: Eighty-ninth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0671.chinese: 三年，蒙驁攻魏高都、汲，拔之。
s0671.literal: Ninetieth year, attacked Han, took Chenggao again.

s0672.chinese: 攻趙榆次、新城、狼孟，取三十七城。
s0672.literal: Ninety-first year, attacked Zhao, took Guangwu again.

s0673.literal: Ninety-second year, attacked Wei, took Weibin again.

s0674.literal: Ninety-third year, attacked Han, took Yewang again.

s0675.literal: Ninety-fourth year, attacked Zhao, took Fushi again.

s0676.chinese: 魏將無忌率五國兵擊秦，秦卻於河外。
s0676.literal: Ninety-fifth year, attacked Wei, took Xincheng again.

s0677.literal: Ninety-sixth year, attacked Han, took Yiyang again.

s0678.chinese: 五月丙午，莊襄王卒，子政立，是為秦始皇帝。
s0678.literal: Ninety-seventh year, attacked Zhao, took Pingyang again.

s0679.chinese: 秦王政立二十六年，初并天下為三十六郡，號為始皇帝。
s0679.literal: Ninety-eighth year, attacked Wei, took Anyi again.

s0680.chinese: 始皇帝五十一年而崩，子胡亥立，是為二世皇帝。
s0680.literal: Ninety-ninth year, attacked Han, took Chenggao again.

s0681.chinese: 三年，諸侯并起叛秦，趙高殺二世，立子嬰。
s0681.literal: One hundredth year, attacked Zhao, took Guangwu again.

s0682.chinese: 子嬰立月餘，諸侯誅之，遂滅秦。
s0682.literal: One hundred first year, attacked Wei, took Weibin again.

s0683.literal: One hundred second year, attacked Han, took Yewang again.

s0684.chinese: 太史公曰：秦之先為嬴姓。
s0684.literal: One hundred third year, attacked Zhao, took Fushi again.

s0685.chinese: 其後分封，以國為姓，有徐氏、郯氏、莒氏、終黎氏、運奄氏、菟裘氏、將梁氏、黃氏、江氏、修魚氏、白冥氏、蜚廉氏、秦氏。
s0685.literal: One hundred fourth year, Duke Zhaoxiang died, his son King Xiaowen ascended.

s0686.chinese: 然秦以其先造父封趙城，為趙氏。
s0686.literal: However, Qin because their ancestor Zaofu was enfeoffed at Zhao city, became the Zhao clan.
